quote: When the sun was about to set, a deep sleep fell upon Aʹbram and a great and frightening darkness descended on him.
The western boundary was at the Great Sea and its coast. This was the boundary of the descendants of Judah by their families on all sides.

and he said to them: “You are the heads of the paternal houses of the Levites. Sanctify yourselves, you and your brothers, and bring the Ark of Jehovah the God of Israel up to the place that I have prepared for it.
